body.p: This version contains the NISP Volumes 1 - 3 in both html and pdf formats.

This document, ADatP-34(I), is developed by the Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT) under the authority of the NATO Consultation, Command and Control Board (C3B). It was noted by the C3 Board (AC/322-N(2016)xxxx) making the Volume 2 standards and volume 3 profiles mandatory for use in NATO common funded systems, and made available to the general public as a replacement for ADatP-34(H).
